resources.string:
Importing a file

You can use either the Ward computer or the Ward website as a source for your data. If using the Ward computer, place the Membership.csv file in WardRoster directory on your SD card. If using the Ward website, download the CSV file from Membership Directory, name it Directory.csv, and place it in the WardRoster directory on your SD card. Then, choose Import from CSV.

Setting a photo

To set a photo, you can long click the photo and choose to acquire it from either the camera or a location on your SD card. If you have acquired photos using another source, you can place appropriately named photos in the proper location and the application will automatically pick them up. For photos of families, name them using the following pattern: lastname_husbandfirstname_wifefirstname.jpg. For example: monsen_thomas_frances.jpg Place family photos in the WardRoster/family directory. For photos of individuals, name them using the following pattern: lastname_firstname_middlename.jpg. For example: monsen_thomas_spencer.jpg. Place individual photos in the WardRoster/individual directory.
